property.name: parent
property.shortdesc: The object's container.

property.name: typename
property.shortdesc: The class name of the object.

property.name: colorSettings
property.shortdesc: The name of the selected color setting's set.

property.name: activeDocument
property.shortdesc: The frontmost document.

property.name: name
property.shortdesc: The application name.

property.name: path
property.shortdesc: The full path of the location of the Adobe Photoshop application.

property.name: preferences
property.shortdesc: The application preference settings (equivalent to selecting Edit>Preferences in the Adobe Photoshop application in Windows or Photoshop>Preferences in Mac OS).

property.name: scriptingVersion
property.shortdesc: The version of the Scripting interface.

property.name: freeMemory
property.shortdesc: The amount of unused memory available to Photoshop.

property.name: version
property.shortdesc: The version of Adobe Photoshop application that you are running.

property.name: displayDialogs
property.shortdesc: The dialog mode for the document, which indicates whether or not Photoshop displays dialogs when the script runs.

property.name: foregroundColor
property.shortdesc: The default foreground color (used to paint, fill, and stroke selections).

property.name: backgroundColor
property.shortdesc: The default background color (used to paint, fill, and stroke selections).

property.name: playbackParameters
property.shortdesc: The playback options, which indicate the speed at which Photoshop plays actions.

property.name: playbackDisplayDialogs
property.shortdesc: The dialog mode for playback mode, which indicates whether or not Photoshop displays dialogs in playback mode.

property.name: notifiersEnabled
property.shortdesc: If true, notifiers are enabled.

property.name: windowsFileTypes
property.shortdesc: A list of the image file extensions Photoshop can open.

property.name: macintoshFileTypes
property.shortdesc: A list of the image file types Photoshop can open.

property.name: preferencesFolder
property.shortdesc: The full path to the preferences folder.

property.name: locale
property.shortdesc: The language locale of the application.

property.name: documents
property.shortdesc: The collection of open documents.

property.name: fonts
property.shortdesc: The fonts installed on this system.

property.name: notifiers
property.shortdesc: The notifiers currently configured (in the Scripts Events Manager menu in the application).

property.name: scriptingBuildDate
property.shortdesc: The build date of the scripting interface.

property.name: recentFiles
property.shortdesc: Files in the Recent Files list.

property.name: build
property.shortdesc: The build number.

property.name: systemInformation
property.shortdesc: The system and applicaiton information.

property.name: measurementLog
property.shortdesc: The log of measurements taken.

method.name: togglePalettes
method.shortdesc: Toggle palette visibility.

method.name: doAction
method.shortdesc: Plays the specified action from the Actions palette.

parameters.name: action
parameters.shortdesc: The name of the action to play. (Note that the action name is case-sensitive and must match the name as it appears in the Actions palette.)

parameters.name: from
parameters.shortdesc: The name of the action set containing the action being played. (Note that the Action Set name is case-sensitive and must match the name as it appears in the Actions palette.)

method.name: load
method.shortdesc: Loads a support document.

parameters.name: document
parameters.shortdesc: The document to load.

method.name: open
method.shortdesc: Opens the specified document file(s).

parameters.name: document
parameters.shortdesc: The document(s) to opend.

parameters.name: as
parameters.shortdesc: The document type (The default is to let Photoshop deduce the format).

parameters.name: asSmartObject
parameters.shortdesc: Creates a smart object around the document.

method.name: purge
method.shortdesc: Purges one or more caches.

parameters.name: target
parameters.shortdesc: The caches to purge.

method.name: makePhotoGallery
method.shortdesc: Deprecated for Adobe Photoshop CS3. Creates a web photo gallery.

parameters.name: inputFolder
parameters.shortdesc: Folder to process or an array of files to process.

parameters.name: outputFolder
parameters.shortdesc: Location for output files.

parameters.name: options
parameters.shortdesc: Options for the web photo gallery.

method.name: makePDFPresentation
method.shortdesc: Creates a PDF presentation file.

parameters.name: inputFiles
parameters.shortdesc: The input files to include in the presentation.

parameters.name: outputFile
parameters.shortdesc: The location of the output file.

parameters.name: options
parameters.shortdesc: Options for the PDF presentation.

method.name: makePhotomerge
method.shortdesc: Deprecated for Adobe Photoshop CS3. Merges multiple files into one, user interaction required.

parameters.name: inputFiles
parameters.shortdesc: List of input files to include.

method.name: makeContactSheet
method.shortdesc: Creates a contact sheet from multiple files.

parameters.name: inputFiles
parameters.shortdesc: The files to include.

parameters.name: options
parameters.shortdesc: Options for creating the contact sheet.

method.name: makePicturePackage
method.shortdesc: Creates a picture package from multiple files.

parameters.name: inputFiles
parameters.shortdesc: The files to include.

parameters.name: options
parameters.shortdesc: Options for creating a Picture Package.

method.name: batch
method.shortdesc: Runs the batch automation routine; analogous to using the Batch command in Photoshop.

parameters.name: inputFiles
parameters.shortdesc: The files to operate on.

parameters.name: action
parameters.shortdesc: The name of the action to play (note that the Action name is case-sensitive and must match the name in the Actions palette).

parameters.name: from
parameters.shortdesc: The name of the action set containing the action being played (note that the Action Set name is case-sensitive and must match the name in the Actions palette).

parameters.name: options
parameters.shortdesc: Options for batch automation.

method.name: bringToFront
method.shortdesc: Makes Photoshop the active application.

method.name: refresh
method.shortdesc: Pauses the script until the application refreshes.

method.name: putCustomOptions
method.shortdesc: Saves user objects in the Photoshop registry.

parameters.name: key
parameters.shortdesc: The unique string ID for the user object.

parameters.name: customObject
parameters.shortdesc: The user-defined custom object to save in the registry.

parameters.name: persistent
parameters.shortdesc: If true, the object persists after the script has finished.

method.name: getCustomOptions
method.shortdesc: Retrieves user objects from the Photoshop registry for the ID with value key.

parameters.name: key
parameters.shortdesc: The unique string ID for the user object.

method.name: eraseCustomOptions
method.shortdesc: Removes the specified user objects from the Photoshop registry.

parameters.name: key
parameters.shortdesc: The unique string ID for user object(s) to remove.

method.name: featureEnabled
method.shortdesc: If true, the specified feature is enabled.

parameters.name: name
parameters.shortdesc: The name of the feature.

method.name: openDialog
method.shortdesc: Uses the Photoshop open dialog to select files.

method.name: runMenuItem
method.shortdesc: Run a menu item with the given ID. Use this for Insert Menu Item.

method.name: executeAction
method.shortdesc: Plays an ActionManager event.

parameters.name: eventID
parameters.shortdesc: The event to play.

parameters.name: descriptor
parameters.shortdesc: The action descriptor to play.

parameters.name: displayDialogs
parameters.shortdesc: The display permissions for dialogs and alert messages.

method.name: executeActionGet
method.shortdesc: Obtains an action descriptor.

parameters.name: reference
parameters.shortdesc: The reference specification of the property.

method.name: stringIDToTypeID
method.shortdesc: Converts from a string ID to a runtime ID.

parameters.name: stringID
parameters.shortdesc: The ID to convert.

method.name: typeIDToStringID
method.shortdesc: Converts from a runtime ID to a string ID.

parameters.name: typeID
parameters.shortdesc: The ID to convert.

method.name: charIDToTypeID
method.shortdesc: Converts from a four character code to a runtime ID.

parameters.name: charID
parameters.shortdesc: The ID to convert.

method.name: typeIDToCharID
method.shortdesc: Converts from a runtime ID to a character ID.

parameters.name: typeID
parameters.shortdesc: The ID to convert.

method.name: beep
method.shortdesc: Alerts the user.
